Hero.IBuildStuff: I build stuff on the web

introduce.part2: based in Paris, France, specializing in building (and occasionally designing) amazing websites.

About.title: About me

introduce.part2: I am a self-taught developer, passionate about the web and love to create stuff. I eventually graduated in web development at
introduce.part3: and still look forward to learning new things every day. Currently at
introduce.part4: , I work on a wide variety of interesting and meaningful projects on a daily basis.

About.IVBeenWorkingWith: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

project1.title: Home page
project1.description: A landing page where you get multiples informations like your todo list, time, weather or some  daily quotes.

project2.title: Bike reservation
project2.description: A bike reservation interface where you can see in real time in the city of Toulouse, the number of bikes available at each station as well as book one of them.

project3.title: Natours
project3.description: A landing page for a travel site.

project4.title: Portfolio v2
project4.description: The previous version of my portfolio site.

project5.title: Yams
project5.description: Reproduction of the yams game for a solo version.

project6.title: Hairdresser
project6.description: A landing page for a hairdressing site.

project7.title: Rick & Morty
project7.description: An interface to consult and search all the episodes of the Rick & Morty series.

project8.title: Sweet Coffee
project8.description: A landing page for a coffee site.

project9.title: Portfolio v1
project9.description: The first version of my portfolio site.

content.part1: Although I'm not currently looking for any new opportunities,
